perfumes_data.name: St Barts OUAI for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: St Barts by OUAI is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. St Barts was launched in 2024. Top notes are Pitahaya, Sea Notes and Orange Oil; middle notes are Tuberose, Moroccan Jasmine and Orange Blossom; base notes are Amber and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: St Barts Hair and Body Mist by Ouai is a versatile fragrance designed to refresh both hair and body. This mist offers a light and invigorating scent, perfect for daily use.

perfumes_data.name: Vénus Nina Ricci for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Vénus by Nina Ricci is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Vénus was launched in 2024. Vénus was created by Alexandra Monet, Nathalie Lorson and Olivier Cresp. Top notes are Mandarin and Magnolia Leaf; middle notes are Magnolia and Jasmine; base notes are Vanilla and Patchouli.

perfumes_data.name: Cocoyster Salum Parfums for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Cocoyster by Salum Parfums is a Floral Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cocoyster was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sofia Bardelli. Top notes are Sea water, Sea Salt and Oysters; middle notes are Coconut Milk, Coconut and Ylang Ylang; base notes are Vanilla, Amber, Incense and elemi.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: The taste of a salty oyster with exquisite sea nuances captivates the senses. The caress of a provocative coconut adds an exotic note. The ambiance is warmed by incense, amber, and vanilla, creating a enveloping atmosphere. What else?

perfumes_data.name: Valentino Donna Born in Roma Green Stravaganza Valentino for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Valentino Donna Born in Roma Green Stravaganza by Valentino is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Valentino Donna Born in Roma Green Stravaganza was launched in 2024. Top note is Lapsang Souchong Tea; middle note is Jasmine; base note is Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Born in Roma Donna Green Stravaganza is an opulent fragrance that captures the essence of Rome's lush gardens and vibrant spirit. This floral-ambery scent, featuring a luxurious blend of Lapsang Souchong tea and Jasmine absolute, encapsulates the grandeur of the eternal city.
The fragrance belongs to the Floral-Orientaly family. It starts with the smoky and intriguing aroma of Lapsang Souchong Tea at the top. The heart of the fragrance is a radiant display of Jasmine Absolute, symbolizing modern femininity under the Roman sun. The scent culminates with a base of rich Vanilla Extract, sustainably sourced, adding a captivating and luxurious finish to this extraordinary olfactory journey.
Fragrance family: Floral-Orientaly
Top notes: Lapsang Souchong Tea Accord
Heart Notes: Jasmine Absolute
Base notes: Vanilla Extract
Born in Roma Donna Green Stravaganza is more than just a fragrance; it's an experience that invites you to embrace your unique identity and the freedom to express yourself. This scent is an ode to the iconic Valentino Rockstud, reflecting the daring and luxurious ethos of Maison Valentino.
The bottle's design pays homage to this iconic symbol, with an edgy pyramidal structure inspired by Roman architecture. Adorned with the distinctive Rockstud details and draped in vibrant green and black leather, the bottle is a bold statement of extravagance and style, embodying the essence of Valentino's fearless spirit.

perfumes_data.name: Memori Encens Lumière Kenzo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Memori Encens Lumière by Kenzo is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Memori Encens Lumière was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Karine Dubreuil-Sereni.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Interpretation of a hut with mystical scents; that of the worn leather and the silk of kimonos, majestic dresses impregnated with incense sachets that geishas slip into the hollow of their sleeves to perfume themselves. The Eau de Parfum Encens Lumière, for women and men, accurately combines the smoky notes of Incense with the floral sweetness of Freesia and Saffron flowers.
Perfumer Karine Dubreuil-Sereni explains

"I endeavored to capture the olfactory sensations - as I imagined them - that one may experience in a mysterious Japanese teahouse. Incense is the very pillar of my creation. A noble material, it brings unique light as well as depth and elegance to this perfume. Its contrasting scents first exude sparkling top notes, before giving way to a warm and enveloping trail."

perfumes_data.name: Gingham Gorgeous Bath & Body Works for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Gingham Gorgeous by Bath & Body Works is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Gingham Gorgeous was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Vincent Kuczinski.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Bath & Body Works Gingham Gorgeous Fine Fragrance Mist is a newly launched product from the popular American brand, Bath & Body Works. This fragrance mist contains an alcohol-based formula that is lightweight and easy to wear for everyday use. As a fine fragrance mist, it has a lower concentration of fragrance oils compared to an eau de parfum, making it ideal for those who prefer a more subtle scent. The Gingham Gorgeous Fine Fragrance Mist belongs to the Floral Fruity group of fragrances and is designed to evoke happiness and femininity with its beautiful floral notes. The fragrance notes of the Gingham Gorgeous Fine Fragrance Mist include pink strawberries, peach nectar, and peony blooms. The scent starts off with a sweet and fruity aroma of strawberries and peach, which then blends into a floral heart of peonies. The overall effect is a beautifully balanced fragrance that smells both feminine and fresh. This fragrance would be ideal for those who love fruity scents but also want a touch of floral elegance. The Gingham Gorgeous Fine Fragrance Mist is perfect for spring and summer wear or for any occasion that calls for a light and refreshing fragrance.

perfumes_data.name: Do Son Limited Edition Diptyque for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Do Son Limited Edition by Diptyque is a Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Do Son Limited Edition was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin. Top notes are Orange Blossom, Orange Leaf and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Tuberose and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Benzoin and Rose.

perfumes_data.name: À Fleur de Pêche L'Artisan Parfumeur for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: À Fleur de Pêche by L'Artisan Parfumeur is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. À Fleur de Pêche was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Antoine Maisondieu. Top note is Peach; middle note is Jasmine; base note is Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: "With À Fleur de Pêche, Antoine Maisondieu captures the essence of the peach, the elegant fruit that seduced the gourmets of Louis XIV's court. By combining its fruity, floral, and woody notes with unexpected ingredients, the unique fragrance reflects all the facets of the fruit, from its juicy flesh to its fuzzy touch and woody core." -Brand website.

perfumes_data.name: Monica Gritti for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Monica by Gritti is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Monica was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Luca Gritti. Top notes are Litchi, Peony, Apricot and Fruity Notes; middle notes are Jasmine, White Musk and Sandalwood; base notes are Amber, Vanilla and Woody Notes.

perfumes_data.name: Flowerbomb Frozen Flower Viktor&Rolf for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Flowerbomb Frozen Flower by Viktor&Rolf is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Flowerbomb Frozen Flower was launched in 2024. Top notes are Freesia, Orchid and Rose; middle notes are Jasmine and Osmanthus; base notes are Vanilla and Patchouli.

perfumes_data.name: Love Delight Amouage for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Love Delight by Amouage is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Love Delight was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pascal Gaurin. Top notes are Ginger, Mandarin Orange, Cinnamon and Rose Water; middle notes are Heliotrope, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Vanilla, Cacao, Rum and Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The interplay of delicate florals and irrestible treats, radiance, and insouciance. Love Delight is an invite to savour every moment of indulgence.
Amouage Love Delight will be available from February 8th, 2024, as 100ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Type 2: Red Currant & Balsam Guess for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Type 2: Red Currant & Balsam by Guess is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Type 2: Red Currant & Balsam was launched in 2023. Top notes are Red Currant, Jasmine and Bergamot; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Vetiver and Cedar; base notes are Amber, Musk, Balsam Fir and oak moss.

perfumes_data.name: Cozy Vanilla Bourbon Bath & Body Works for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Cozy Vanilla Bourbon by Bath & Body Works is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Cozy Vanilla Bourbon was launched in 2023.

perfumes_data.name: Bukhara Ormonde Jayne for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Bukhara by Ormonde Jayne is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bukhara was launched in 2024. Bukhara was created by Linda Pilkington and Expressions Parfumees Grasse. Top notes are Peach, Blackcurrant and Bergamot; middle notes are Tuberose, Orange Blossom and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Vanilla, Amber, Sandalwood, White Cedar Extract and Agarwood (Oud).
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Bukhara, from the esteemed Route de la Soie collection, embodies a sense of lavish refinement. Succulent peach and blackcurrant open this fragrance, conjuring images of a tantalising oasis. At its heart, Bukhara exudes an entrancing bouquet of tuberose, jasmine absolute, and orange blossom, evoking a graceful floral allure. The dry down unfurls with a sensuous base of sandalwood, cedarwood, vanilla, and oudh, enveloping the wearer in a warm embrace.

perfumes_data.name: Lionora Mind Games for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Lionora by Mind Games is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lionora was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christelle Laprade. Top notes are Passionfruit, Tonka Bean and Ginger; middle notes are Apricot, Osmanthus and Freesia; base notes are Lactones, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The elusive scent of Lionora celebrates the seductive allure of grace, beauty, and wisdom. Indulgent bursts of fruits and florals soak into the honeyed, animalic notes of Osmanthus fragrance, before melting into the soft and creamy notes of sandalwood in this luxury perfume. Powerful in its delicacy, and completely enchanting, Lionora captures the passion and romance of new love, and the strength and sweetness of true love.
"Lionora is meant to immerse the senses in the multidimensional texture of apricot skin and blooming white floralcy. Top notes of ginger Madagascar and passionfruit are encased in the soft heart of freesia and the delicate, blossoming petals of our Osmanthus DeLaire. Creamy, edible sandalwood and tonkalactoneleave a warming, skin- hugging trail that feels effortlessly elegant and timeless." - Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.

perfumes_data.name: Girl of the Year Thin Wild Mercury for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Girl of the Year by Thin Wild Mercury is a Leather fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Girl of the Year was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Cathleen Cardinali. Top notes are Lipstick and Incense; middle notes are Leather and Smoke; base notes are Orris Root, Fur and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A dark and feminine combination of burning incense and buttery lipstick permeating through a smoker’s leather jacket drying down to a creamy, warm sandalwood and musky, powdery orris root.
Girl of the Year is an exploration into the private enclaves of the woman, off film, away from parties, protected from the flash of the camera. It is the quiet moments between calls and engagements, the space reserved for nestling into your memories. Artifacts of a life being lived populate your space, untidy and endearing: the leather jacket left behind by a lover lazily draped on the sofa, your vanity clumsy with perfumes and jewelry, the littered ashtray on your windowsill. Every article of clothing and tube of lipstick a talisman of self expression and protection becomes a souvenir of the moment, iconic of an era. From the solitude of your dressing table, you stare at your reflection with no one else to see. The phone rings.

perfumes_data.name: Miss Giordani Floral Oriflame for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Miss Giordani Floral by Oriflame is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Miss Giordani Floral was launched in 2024. Top notes are Neroli, Mandarin Orange and Ginger; middle notes are Tuberose, Jasmine and Peony; base notes are Ylang Ylang, Vanilla and Cedar.

perfumes_data.name: Bianca Forte Cristian Cavagna for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Bianca Forte by Cristian Cavagna is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Bianca Forte was launched in 2024. Bianca Forte was created by Cristian Cavagna and Arturetto Landi. Top notes are Banana Leaf, Coconut and Ginger; middle notes are Tuberose, Ylang Ylang and Gardenia; base notes are Indian Tuberose, Sandalwood, Tolu Balsam and Vanilla.

perfumes_data.name: Ambrosia Imperiale Navitus Parfums for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Ambrosia Imperiale by Navitus Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ambrosia Imperiale was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Bertrand Duchaufour. Top notes are Banana, Rum, Davana, Brazilian Orange and Ceylon Cinnamon; middle notes are Dates, Amberwood, Orchid and Jasmine; base notes are Saffron, Whipped Cream, Vanilla, Caramel, Benzoin and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
An impactful yet unique opening is introduced through a unique banana note, in addition to rum, Brazilian orange, Ceylon cinnamon and davana which is then joined by dates, orchid, jasmine and amberwood in the heart. Whipped cream, saffron, vanilla, caramel, benzoin and musk project out a unique sillage ensuring the wearer is creating an impressive aura for several hours.
Created by Master Perfumer Bertrand Duchaufour with creative direction from AI The Great.

perfumes_data.name: Cuirtis Areej Le Doré for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Cuirtis by Areej Le Doré is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cuirtis was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Russian Adam. Top notes are Castoreum, Osmanthus, Cumin and juniper berry; middle notes are Castoreum, Birch Tar, Orris, Vanilla, Geranium and Rose; base notes are Russian Leather, Castoreum, Oud, Violet Leaf and Oakmoss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Step into an autumn forest full of a wild and leathery aroma. This composition is focused on beaver extracts and executed in a vintage style. It brings together all the nuances of animalic leather, from vintage tar oil, Indian oud, and smoky birch tar to narcotic osmanthus. Cuirtis is where the forest meets leather.
Top notes: Russian castoreum, USA beaver tail oil, osmanthus, cumin, and juniper berry
Heart notes: birch tar, parijat flower, vintage geranium, rose, aged co-tincture of orris, vanilla, and USA castoreum
Base notes: tar oil from circa 1920s, vintage-style cuir de Russie accord, Manipur oud from 2005, Canadian castoreum, oakmoss, and violet leaf absolute
